Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Gilbert.
Argued December 2, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, with him Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellant.
Joseph R. Danella, with him Louis Lipschitz, for appellee.
October 12, 1971 :
